33.eng-name: Retiring to a Mosque for Remembrance of Allah (I'tikaf)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha:One of the wives of Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) practiced I`tikaf with him while she ad bleeding in between her periods and she would see red (blood) or yellowish traces, and sometimes we put a tray beneath her when she offered the prayer

chapter.eng-name: I'tikaf of a woman who has bleeding in between her periods
